file_content.text: Trouble on Makeb, Commander. A Jedi Master named Adelade dug up some kind of monstrosity buried deep inside the planet.
The Makeb crisis has been contained. Good work, Commander.
Oggurobb will examine what's left of the "Gethul" abomination. If it corrupted Adelade's mind, we need to figure out how to guard against it.
Either way, you did what was necessary. The Jedi had to be neutralized. Thanks to you, Makeb is safe.
You're approaching the dig site. Protect the payload, and bury that monster.
Be careful. Adelade's followers will stop at nothing to destroy the payload.
Secure the payload and deliver the explosives to Adelade's monstrosity. Makeb is counting on you.
More importantly, you exterminated the Jedi and blasted his abomination into a puddle of soup. Decisive victories like this make the galaxy fear the Alliance.
They call this abomination "Gethul." We're talking giant tentacles, blaster-proof skin, and enough strength to destabilize the planet's core. We've never seen anything like it.
Adelade and his followers are trying to wake Gethul. You need to stop them. Deliver an explosive payload into the jaws of the beast--and blow it sky high.
I see you, interlopers. Gethul sees you.
Engineer Penzaren has stopped the interlopers! Gethul sings his praise!
Skurr! Velloc! Fill the interlopers with light.
His song fills us with light and calls for this world's demise. You can't stop his awakening. No one can.
